snippet: The company blamed the harsh weather, but conceded that “challenging industry dynamics” also played a role in a drop in sales at established United States locations.
lead_paragraph: The company blamed the harsh weather, but conceded that “challenging industry dynamics” also played a role in a drop in sales at established United States locations.

headline.main: McDonald’s Sales Fall 1.4% at Established U.S. Sites
headline.print_headline: Mcdonald’s Sales Fall 1.4%. at Established U.S. Sites
